loansAndLiensCriteria.name: EstimatedOpenLoansBalance
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The estimated combined amount of all open loans based on computer model

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: EstimatedNumberOfOpenLoans
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The estimated number of loans currently open and outstanding on the property

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: FreeAndClear
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: Whether the property has no loans or liens (100% equity)

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LoanPurpose
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The purpose of the mortgage - purchase, rate and term refinance, cash-out refinance, construction, HELOC, or reverse mortgage

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LoanType
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The type of loan - conforming, non-conforming, private, seller carryback, FHA, VA, SBA, conventional or jumbo

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LoanDate
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The date the mortgage was recorded at the county

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LoanConcurrent
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: Whether or not this loan was made concurrently (at the same time) as another

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LoanAmount
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The loan amount of the mortgage

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LoanCashOut
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The estimated cash available to the borrower after refinancing or taking additional financing

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LoanToValue
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The loan amount as a percentage of the estimated value at the time the loan was made

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LoanTerm
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The amortization period of the mortgage

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LoanOriginalLender
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The lender name for the mortgage as originally recorded

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LoanARMNegativeAmortization
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: Whether or not an adjustable rate mortgage has a negative amortization indicator

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LienRecordingDate
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The date the lien was recorded at the county recorder's office

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LienType
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The type of lien, for example association (HOA) or mechanics liens

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LienPosition
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The current estimated position of the lien, with lower positions having higher priority

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LienStatus
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The current estimated status of the lien - active or reconveyed (paid off)

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LienAmount
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The original amount of the lien (not the current balance)

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: LienInterestRate
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: The interest rate of the lien, if any

loansAndLiensCriteria.name: HasInvoluntaryLien
loansAndLiensCriteria.description: Whether the property has any involuntary liens such as mechanics liens or HOA liens

criteriaTypes.Multiple Values: Accepts an array of multiple values for matching
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range: Accepts a series of arrays with min and max values, e.g. [[100, 200], [300, 400]]
criteriaTypes.Multiple Range Including Unknowns: Same as Multiple Range but includes properties with unknown values
criteriaTypes.Relative Date: Accepts preset date strings like 'Last 30 Days' or specific dates and ranges
